entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
